text: Hofstra University is a private university in Hempstead, New York. The university has about 12,400 students. It was founded in 1935. The current president of the university is Susan Poser. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Pride. They have 15 varsity teams and they compete in the Colonial Athletic Association. ==Other websites== *Hofstra University's Official website *Hofstra Pride's Official athletics website Category:Colonial Athletic Association Category:1935 establishments in the United States Category:1930s establishments in New York (state) Category:Colleges and universities in New York (state)
title: Hofstra University
